data.name: Nebula Complex: Survival
data.detailed_description:
Nebula Complex: Survival is an open-world, story-driven survival game set in the year 3001, in the distant Gordon System. Crash landing on the planet Dylan-4 in enemy territory, you must explore, craft, and fight for survival, until help arrives.

Exlore the wilds

Explore the wilds of Dylan-4, collect resources, and craft materials, and discover the secrets of the ones who inhabited the planet before you.

Discover the past

As you explore and scavenge the planet for it's natural resources, you may stumble upon something not so natural...
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: An open-world, story-driven survival game. Explore the wilds, collect resources, craft, build, and fight to survive! As the days pass by, you must stay alive on an alien planet, and find a way to contact help.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly on older Windows Versions
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 16 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistic bloodshed, use of melee weapons and firearms, violence towards alien creatures and robotic characters.
